positions.title: Quali

given.text:
I had the pleasure of working for Breen for several years, where he helped grow me from an entry-level co-op position to a full time engineer. Since leaving Breen's organization, I have shifted my role from engineer, to senior engineer, to an engineering manager. The biggest compliment I can give to Breen's management style and his capabilities is that I model a lot of my behavior in leading my team based on what I learned and witnessed first-hand in working for and with Breen.
…
